name: Commonwealth, ex rel. Koontz, District Attorney, and Calhoun, Appellant, v. Dunkle
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Koontz v. Dunkle

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth, ex rel. Koontz, District Attorney, and Calhoun, Appellant, v. Dunkle.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Wright. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: D. Cress Reiley, with him Alvin L. Little, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, ex rel. Koontz, District Attorney, and Calhoun, Appellant, v. Dunkle.
Argued December 4, 1946.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
D. Cress Reiley, with him Alvin L. Little, for appellant.
Richard C. Snyder, for appellee.
January 6, 1947:
